content: What you’re saying about rate of weight gain makes perfect fucking sense. What’s interesting is the resistance you pointed out from friends and doctors. Even when I’ve casually pointed out that “I’m a little heavier than I used to be.” or the other day “this type of excercise is making my core thicker”, a completely neutral statement of fact, my friends respond in this frightened reflexive “NO! You’re sooo thin!”. Did I just say I was a bad person? Appearantly having a thick middle is an awful thing you should never say about yourself. For the record, I’m not soooooo thin. I’m at the top range of a normal bmi. I do not WANT to be soooooo thin. I want to be able to describe my body without being corrected by randos.
